projects.label: DevOps consultant
projects.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Security Consulting
projects.description:
I helped while the company restructured their infrastructure team. My responsibilities were:
- improving and securing some internal CI/CD processes
- transitioning automation jobs from Jenkins to GitLab CI with Docker containers
- preparing proof-of-concept solutions for integrated testing and production environments with different container management software. For instance, one PoC was using docker compose to run integration tests of complex interconnected applications. Another example was using Docker Cloud (and later Kubernetes on Google Cloud) to potentially run and manage multiple services in production)
- integrating LetsEncrypt to replace self-signed certificates in a lot of the CI infrastructure
- helping with the dissemination of DevOps knowledge and the hiring of new people

I also taught a short Golang crash course due to interested employees.

projects.label: Xen VPSes
projects.name: Xen on-demand virtual servers
projects.description: The cloud in 2006... sort of :). We made a system for automated on-demand customizable Xen servers. Just from our web interface you could create a new VM with custom resources, automatically install your preferred Linux distribution on it and have it running in a few minutes. After that you could log in via ssh or manage the VM entirely through the web interface. The billing was on a monthly basis, but that was a business decision - our freely-accessible online demo created a new test server on demand and automatically destroyed in an hour.
